posts.post_content:
The hole-y grail of my collection. A beautiful T206 Walter Johnson Portrait with a tougher SC Factory 649 cross out back.  Sadly, it had met up with small hole puncher some years ago. 

Image is amazing, back is nice, corners touched but not too bad. 

Take a look at it. It's got plenty to recommend it, as well as a serious flaw. 

Asking $300. Would consider offers or trades. 

[URL=http://s235.photobucket.com/user/bbcard1/media/IMG_4231_zps0evetpqf.jpg.html][IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/IMG_4231_zps0evetpqf.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s235.photobucket.com/user/bbcard1/media/IMG_4232_zpshbsmmomq.jpg.html][IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/IMG_4232_zpshbsmmomq.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

I have the Cy Young portrait to match it!!

Matt
